title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns a HTTP response code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404 page.
EB: When no webapps are deployed and a URL is accessed, the server should return a HTTP error 404 page.
SR:
1. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps.
2. Access a URL on the server.
3. Note that a HTTP response code 200 OK with no content is returned instead of a HTTP error 404 page.
